faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Is the Dubai Free Zone a good place to establish my business?
items.answer: With exciting tax incentives, 100% foreign ownership, and strategic access to local and global markets, the Dubai Free Zone is one of the best regions for establishing your business presence.

items.question: What are the ideal free zones for setting up a business?
items.answer: DMCC, Dubai Silicon Oasis, Sharjah Media City, Fujairah Free Zone, UAQ Free Zone, and IFZA are some of the top spots for registering your business.

items.question: What documents do I need to open a UAE free zone company?
items.answer: You’ll need copies of your passports and visas, passport-sized photos, a business activity selection form, and proof of address.

items.question: Can I apply for a residency visa using a free zone license?
items.answer: Yes! Most free zones allow you to apply for 1-6 residency visas, depending on your office type and business activity.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help me open a corporate bank account in a free zone?
items.answer: Yes! Our expert business consultants help you create an account with the best-fit business partner to streamline your finances.
